name: MISTfortune. Director's Cut
description:
You are the only survivor of the USS Fortune crew... It's up to you to escape the deadly mist...

Controls

WASD - movement
E, Left mouse button - interaction
Ctrl, Right mouse button - crouch

Overview
This is the definitive edition of MISTfortune, which includes all the cut content and expands upon the original Asylum Jam 2016 prototype.

New Stuff

  • Physics puzzles
  • More lines for Mistman (new voice too)
  • Music
  • Environmental effects
  • More rooms
  • More endings
  • Unlockable OST as a reward for completion of the game
  • Checkpoint (just single one)
